remarks: Lemma for orthoarguesian law 5OA. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
5oalem3.1 $e |- A e. SH $.
5oalem3.2 $e |- B e. SH $.
5oalem3.3 $e |- C e. SH $.
5oalem3.4 $e |- D e. SH $.
5oalem3.5 $e |- F e. SH $.
5oalem3.6 $e |- G e. SH $.
5oalem4 $p |- ( ( ( ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ ( z e. C /\ w e. D ) ) /\ ( f e. F /\ g e. G ) ) /\ ( ( x +h y ) = ( f +h g ) /\ ( z +h w ) = ( f +h g ) ) ) -> ( x -h z ) e. ( ( ( A +H C ) i^i ( B +H D ) ) i^i ( ( ( A +H F ) i^i ( B +H G ) ) +H ( ( C +H F ) i^i ( D +H G ) ) ) ) ) $.
